mods.abstract: A black and white negative taped to and framed by a masking sheet advertising a Grand Ole Opry Spectacular featuring Hank Snow, Webb Pierce, Del Reeves, Mel Tillis, Jan Hoard, The Frost Brothers, Max Powell, and The Rainbow Ranch Boys at Memorial Hall on March 30. The negative features photographs of Hank Snow, Webb Pierce, Del Reeves, Mel Tillis, and Jan Howard.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
